entry.tran: 室外演奏台；露天音乐台
entry.def: A bandstand is a platform with a roof where a military band or a brass band can play in the open air.
A bandstand is a platform inside a hall or large room where the band that is playing at a dance or other occasion stands.

means.word_mean: 1. a platform where a (brass) band can play in the open air
